mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PH) VALUES (#{name}, #{memberId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT a.rn, a.name, a.memberId, a.password, a.email, a.phoneNumber FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.name, a.memberId, a.password, a.email, a.phoneNumber FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, MEMBER_NAME name, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PW password, MEMBER_EMAIL email, MEMBER_PH phoneNumber FROM MEMBER) a WHERE rn <= 3 * #{page}) a WHERE rn > 3 * (#{page} - 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_name = #{name}, member_email = #{email}, member_pw = #{password}
